summary: The Watershed Results Act authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to carry out watershed pilot projects in Reclamation States. It establishes a framework for selecting "watershed partners" who will use advanced watershed analytics to identify, quantify, and implement cost-effective projects (qualifying activities) aimed at achieving watershed-scale outcomes. The Secretary will provide technical and financial assistance, including performance payments for verified outcomes, and is authorized to appropriate funds for these projects, up to five. The Act establishes reporting requirements and specifies criteria for evaluating project success.
